about_the_game:
This game is a free casual tower defense game.

The pioneers have been salivating at your trash can for a long time! They have formed a garbage can army and are preparing to launch an attack on your home! Reasonably use your characters to resist the repeated attacks of the Garbage Can Legion! Or ...... Join the Garbage Can Legion!

Rich characters and enemies!

● 18 available characters, choose characters reasonably to resist enemies!
● Over 30 different enemies, the game will be more challenging!
● Two giant bosses, powerful bosses will make the battle more intense!

42 independent levels!

● 27 standard levels to resist the attack of the Garbage Can Legion!
● 9 attack levels, join the trash can legion!
● Six small game levels, experience different gameplay!
● Two boss battle levels, detonate your adrenaline in a big scene!
● Multiple uniquely designed maps bring you a brand new experience!

Random mode

● Using your character card will randomly appear any character, even enemies! This will make your gaming experience full of surprises!

Endless mode

● How long can you persist under the relentless attacks of enemies?

There is more to it......

name: 垃圾桶军团

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10,Windows11
  • Processor: i3-12100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
